status.description: status of this query, 0 for success, 1 for error

status_message.description: brief message to explain the query status, useful when status is 1(error)

query_time.description: time use to perform this query, in milliseconds

params.description: parameters of this query, simply return what client give to server.

username.description: username of user whom perform query

include.description: include keywords of this query, will return documents contains all of these keywords

exclude.description: exclude keywords of this query, will return documents not contains these keywords

start.description: for pagination, first index of response, zero-based

rows.description: for pagination, number of documents return in single query

time_start.description: start time of time interval of result, the number of milliseconds since 1970/01/01, -1 when not limit

time_end.description: end time of time interval of result, the number of milliseconds since 1970/01/01, -1 when not limit

order_by.description: return result will order by given value

numFound.description: number of total result in this query

start.description: start index of this response, zero-based.

links.description: links to acces this result, should have unless one

last_modified.description: last modified date, the number of milliseconds since 1970/01/01

keywords.description: keywords of this document, could be empty

content.description: partial content of this document, used to display query result.
